Uses of Class
fr.umlv.zen3.KeyboardEvent

    • Uses of KeyboardEvent in fr.umlv.zen3

      Methods in fr.umlv.zen3 that return KeyboardEvent 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      KeyboardEvent ApplicationContext.pollKeyboard()
      Returns the first keyboard event since or the application was started or ApplicationContext.pollKeyboard() or ApplicationContext.waitKeyboard() was called or null if the user didn't press a key.
      KeyboardEvent ApplicationContext.waitKeyboard()
      Returns the first keyboard event since or the application was started or ApplicationContext.pollKeyboard() or ApplicationContext.waitKeyboard() was called or if the user didn't press a key, this call wait until a key is pressed or the application thread is interrupted.
